jobDescription: Title: Statistical Data AnalystLocation: Arlington, VADuration: Full-TimeTravel: NoneContingent upon award In anticipation of a contract award, MVM, Inc. is looking for a Statistical Data Analyst to provide significant support to the “disrupt and deter” counterterrorism strategy by utilizing techniques to utilize open source and government provided databases to gather, synthesize and compile information on subjects of interest.
